body:
Post your favorite avicus moment!
my peraonal favorite moment was whena guy was swearing and emmy kicked him, when he came back online and said "i had a snickers bar, im different when im hungry." Emmy exused his infraction.

title: Best avicus moment

replies.body: Probably when me and all my TS buds had our interviews and got mod :)

replies.body: Maybe when I first joined Teamspeak and talked wit h Killerbye and a few others?

replies.body: When I first joined the server and played Walls in MC Zone. I never played Walls before but I have seen in it YouTube. I had fun because our team dominated crazy in a sky base. :)
replies.body_tagged: When I first joined the server and played Walls in MC Zone. I never played Walls before but I have seen in it YouTube. I had fun because our team dominated crazy in a sky base. :)

replies.body:
Most likely when I did my first interview, sure I didn't get accepted but the nervous breakdowns were real xD Another cool moment was learning about this: ^_^. That one face lead me to interviews lmao.

There was also some really cool moments in TeamSpeak, Nebula, Elimination and Control The Hill☻ Just can't pick a favourite though.
